mapper.select: SELECT distinct td.ticket_id, td.city_id, td.ticket_name, td.ticket_child_price, td.ticket_due_date, ti.ticket_rep_img_path, ti.ticket_detail_img_path, ct.city_name, (SELECT FORMAT( IFNULL(AVG(r.rv_rating), 0), 1) FROM review r WHERE r.rv_real_id = td.ticket_id ) AS ticket_score FROM ticket_detail td LEFT JOIN ticket_img ti ON td.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id LEFT JOIN city ct ON td.city_id = ct.city_id

SELECT distinct td.*, date_format(td.ticket_due_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS ticket_due_date, td.ticket_adult_price, td.ticket_child_price, ti.ticket_rep_img_path, ti.ticket_detail_img_path, ct.city_name, (SELECT FORMAT( AVG(IFNULL (rv_rating, 0)), 1 ) score FROM review r WHERE r.rv_real_id = td.ticket_id ) AS ticket_score FROM ticket_detail td LEFT JOIN ticket_img ti ON td.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id LEFT JOIN city ct ON td.city_id = ct.city_id WHERE td.ticket_id = #{ticket_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_reservation (ticket_id, mem_id, ticket_name, ticket_puchase_date, ticket_admission_date, ticket_adult_per, ticket_child_per, ticket_total_price) VALUES (#{ticket_id}, #{mem_id}, #{ticket_name}, now(), #{ticket_admission_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticket_adult_per}, #{ticket_child_per}, #{ticket_total_price})
insert into payment(mem_id, ticket_order_id, ticket_id, payment_method) values (#{mem_id},#{ticket_order_id},#{ticket_id},'card')
mapper.delete: delete from basket where mem_id = #{mem_id} and basket_ref_id = #{ticket_id}
